displaytitle: Entrance to the Holy Sepulchre, Jerusalem
creditline: Gift of Barnabas McHenry, Class of 1952, and Bannon McHenry in honor of Joel Smith
inscribed:
Titled above image, center: The Holy Land, / Syria, Idumea, Arabia, Egypt & Nubia. / FROM DRAWINGS MADE ON THE SPOT BY / David Roberts, R. A. / WITH HISTORICAL DESCRIPTIONS BY / THE REVD. GEORGE CROLY, L.L.D. / LITHOGRAPHED BY / LOUIS HAGHE. / VOL. I.

Lettered below image, center: LONDON, F.G. MOON, 20 THREADNEEDLE STREET. / PUBLISHER IN ORDINARY TO HER MAJESTY. / MDCCCELII.

caption: David Roberts (1796–1864; born Stockbridge, Scotland; died London, United Kingdom), Lithographs by Louis Haghe (1806–1885; born Tournai, Belgium; died London, UK; active England), Published by Francis Graham Moon (1796–1871; born London, UK; died Brighton; active London), Entrance to the Holy Sepulchre, Jerusalem, 1842.
